customer_name: Noah Landing Petting Zoo and Pony Rides, Inc.
site_name: NOAH'S LANDING PETTING ZOO AND PONY RIDES, INC.

citations.narrative:
A primary enclosure housing 2 ring-tailed lemurs had an electrical cord to a fan passing inside the enclosure. During the
inspection one of the lemurs placed the cord in their mouth.
Primary enclosures must protect the nonhuman primates from injury.
Correct by July 4, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
